chatter_lunaSettings.tooltip_lowImportanceChatter: If false, most low-priority messages appears as floating text instead of in message field.
chatter_lunaSettings.tooltip_allyChatter: Chatter by allied ships not under your control.
chatter_lunaSettings.tooltip_minMissileOPFractionForChatter: At least this proportion of the ship's weapon OPs should be in missiles in order to print "out of missiles" messages.
chatter_lunaSettings.tooltip_chatterBox: Adds (some) floating text to a message box on right side of screen (in addition to displaying it over the speaking ship).
chatter_lunaSettings.tooltip_chatterBoxOfficerMode: Only named officers appear in chatbox, and it prints their name instead of the ship's name.
chatter_lunaSettings.tooltip_fleetIntro: Intro splash for some fleet types at the start of battles.
chatter_lunaSettings.tooltip_factionSpecificCharacters: Officers have a limited selection of possible characters based on the faction they're from.
chatter_lunaSettings.tooltip_restrictAICharacters: Only certain characters can be used for AI officers.
chatter_lunaSettings.tooltip_personalityChanceScaling: Make characters with only 1-2 allowed personalities have higher chance to be picked.
chatter_lunaSettings.tooltip_genderChanceScaling: Makes gender-specific characters more likely to be picked.
